cornhole_referee module

cornhole_referee.main()[source]

main Invokes the appropriate cornhole referee function or method based on the provided command line arguments

If the -c option is used, the image_capture process will start to collect images for dataset creation. If the -i option is used with an argument of 0, then an inference on a live camera stream will be started. The score will not be calculated. If the -i option is used with an argument of 1, then the user will be prompted for an image or video file path. Once it has been provided, an inference on that file will be started. The score will not be calculated. If the -t option is used, a new version of the cornhole referee model will be forcefully trained. If no options are provided, then an inference on a live camera stream will be started. The score will be calculated.
